artefact.overview: You need to register annually with the Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA) if you have equipment containing Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCBs)
artefact.will_continue_on: the Scottish Environment Protection Agency website
artefact.licence_short_description: Register with the Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA) if you have equipment containing Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCBs).
artefact.licence_overview:
If you hold equipment in Scotland containing Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCBs), you must register annually with the [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA).](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)"){:rel="external"}

A registration fee is payable.
